document.full_text: yemeni police opened fire on protesters in sanaa and taiz on tuesday, killing at least three people, as protesters tried to escalate their campaign to end president ali abdullah saleh's 32-year rule.
document.title: yemen police kill 3 as protests escalate
lines_and_colors: yemeni police opened fire on protesters in sanaa and taiz on tuesday, killing at least three people, as protesters tried to escalate their campaign to end president ali abdullah saleh's 32-year rule.
